EmailTemplate.subject: Let Pivotal guide you on your cloud journey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for stopping by the Pivotal booth at the recent Gartner Catalyst event; we hope you found the conference informative and valuable!
Pivotal is excited to help companies that are ready to take advantage of the opportunities facing IT organizations today. Of course these opportunities also bring with them challenges, and Pivotal is uniquely positioned to help organizations as they embark on their journey. Whether you’re just starting to investigate a cloud platform, or looking to completely transform your IT architecture and processes to be more Agile and DevOps oriented, Pivotal can guide you down that path; start today with a free trial of Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=menu&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=gettingstartedwithpcf&mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWmpFeU1EQXpOR0psWVRSaiIsInQiOiJmM3cxdGxybk5SWmRPbnlTOUJ0ZFBLXC9RdjlXeW5IblVwaHlicGJobzhJbGg1SERxdGNDYnVHaFdNSkNodHV0WWRpdEYyVTgzenZaK2lYTXpIaSt5S1E9PSJ9]]>.
To hear about an organization that has successfully undertaken a transformative journey, check out Allstate: Anatomy of a Technological and Cultural Transformation, via Gartner Events on Demand <[[http://www.gartnereventsondemand.com/?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWmpFeU1EQXpOR0psWVRSaiIsInQiOiJmM3cxdGxybk5SWmRPbnlTOUJ0ZFBLXC9RdjlXeW5IblVwaHlicGJobzhJbGg1SERxdGNDYnVHaFdNSkNodHV0WWRpdEYyVTgzenZaK2lYTXpIaSt5S1E9PSJ9]]>: we think you'll enjoy it. To hear more customer stories, and for more information on how Pivotal is transforming how the world builds software, check out the recorded sessions from Pivotal's SpringOne Platform conference <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx]]>; they cover a wide range of topics from Cloud Native Architectures, to Java, Data Microservices, DevOps, and much more.
Finally, take advantage of our library of resources:
- Recipe for Smart Applications <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/features/a-recipe-for-smart-applications]]> by Jeff Kelly - Insights to Action: How to Transform Your Business with Smart Applications <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/how-to-transform-your-business-with-smart-applications]]> Webinar On-Demand - Perfecting the Software Life Cycle <[[https://pivotal.io/agile/webinar/perfecting-the-software-life-cycle]]> Webinar - How Important is Platform and Cloud Portability? <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/platform-and-cloud-portability]]> Webinar - O’Reilly eBooks <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/1/ebooks]]>
We hope you find these resources informative and inspiring and thank you for your interest in Pivotal!
